abstract: Ferrari North America is recalling some 2016 California T vehicles due to risk of fuel leak in engine compartment.
lead_paragraph: Ferrari North America is recalling some 2016 California T vehicles because of the risk of a fuel leak in the engine compartment, according to a United States Department of Transportation notice .

headline.main: Ferrari Recalls Up to 185 Vehicles for Fuel Leak Risk
headline.print_headline: Ferrari Recalls Up to 185 Vehicles for Fuel Leak Risk

snippet: Ferrari North America is recalling some 2016 California T vehicles because of the risk of a fuel leak in the engine compartment, according to a United States Department of Transportation notice .
